channel.title: Cypress on Master of Software Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Cypress on Master of Software Engineering

item.title: Robust end-to-end testing with Docker Compose
item.description: End-to-end (E2E) testing is a powerful tool for automated quality assurance. Ideally you want to be able to catch potential errors and bugs already on the unit testing level, but doing so can sometimes be both time-consuming and difficult. Unit testing also relies heavily on mocking out dependencies by nature, so we cannot necessarily guarantee the same behaviour as in our live application. E2E tests are on the other hand often very straightforward to set up and write, and enables us to construct very realistic testing scenarios.
